name: All Points Bulletin (APB): Vendetta
blurb: APB Vendetta: an Extreme Agility Shoot-and-Slash FPS with unique fighting-game inspired characters, and \u201ceasy-to-mod\u201d server tools.

rewards.reward: BASE PACK ($39.99 retail, $25 during Kickstarter Period Only): Full APB Vendetta PC game with with all 12 characters, guns, content, and server customization tools (hosting not included, on-demand hosting optional).

EARLY BETA + BASE PACK: Full game at launch (same as "BASE PACK"), PLUS early access to early development builds AND exclusive password protected access to the developer forums, ability to offer feedback on tool systems and game play. You will also receive a unique in-game "Omerta" tag to signify your status as an early-beta contributor.

PLUS PACK + FUTURE CONTENT: Includes base pack AND the next two optional DLC packs. As a bonus if stretch goal is reached and we produce a digital version of the game on a different platform (PS4 etc.) then this award will include a digital code for that platform.

EARLY BETA + PLUS PACK + FUTURE CONTENT (if stretch goal is reached): Includes full game at launch, early beta access, development forum access, and next two optional DLC content packs. You will also receive a unique in-game "Omerta" tag to signify your status as an early-beta contributor. Also IF the stretch goal is reached to produce a digital version on a different platform (PS4 etc.) then this award will include a digital code for that platform
HOST PACK: Includes all of "BASE PACK," and adds 12 months of Dedicated Hosting for your personal server (a $220 retail value). Also includes a special in-game tag for all founding  server owners.

EARLY BETA + HOST PACK: Same as "HOST PACK" and you get access to early development builds and exclusive password protected access to the developer forums, ability to offer feedback on tool systems and game play. You will also receive a unique in-game "Don" tag to signify your status as an early-beta contributor at the hosting level, and early-beta hosting tester.

HOST PACK PLUS + FUTURE CONTENT (if stretch goal is reached): Same as the "Host Pack," but adds two major DLC content packs and if stretch goal reached and we create a digital version on a different platform (PS4 etc.) then this award will include a digital code for that platform

EARLY BETA + HOST PACK PLUS + FUTURE CONTENT (if stretch goal is reached): Same as "Host Pack Plus Content", but you will get access to early development builds and exclusive password protected access to the developer forums, the ability to offer feedback on tool systems and game play. You will also receive a unique in-game "Don" tag to signify your status as an early-beta contributor and early-beta hosting tester.
CREDIT PACK: All previous rewards and your name in the credits.  You also receive a Kickstarter exclusive Motocross Helmet with Tinted Visor for use by all of your characters in-game.

NOSTALGIA PACK: All of the previous rewards, plus we\u2019ll extract your personal character from APB: Reloaded and introduce it as a Mook character in APB: Vendetta\u2019s Story mode. This tier also provides a dedicated server for you and your friends for two years starting from launch.

SUPER EARLY FOUNDER and BUDDY PACK: Get all the benefits of the Early Beta PACKs for yourself. Get automatic access to all very early stage builds and road-maps, and be part of the first wave of friends-and-family testing that takes place ahead of all other closed beta tests. Get a mention in the Game Credits, and a signed poster from the Development team. Also get 6 digital codes for the "HOST PACK PLUS" reward levels that never expire that you are free to share with friends.

MAYORAL PACK: Get all the benefits of SUPER EARLY FOUNDER and BUDDY PACK, but with 12 HOST PACK PLUS codes that never expire to share with your friends (instead of 6). As Mayor you get to see early drafts of the GDD, you will participate in the very earliest development of new content, and you get to name at least one area of the game. You will be considered a "Contributor" in the official Game Credits.

All of the previous rewards, plus any content designed in the All Points Bulletin Universe will be free to you, forever. This includes APB: Vendetta, APB: Reloaded and any future projects that fall under the same umbrella. On top of this, you become our Official APB: Vendetta Easter-Egg. We will work with you to create a statuette based on either yourself, your APB: Reloaded character, or anything you want. One of these will then be hidden in each of the launch levels in super-secret spots. An Achievement will then be added to the game, named after you (or a name that you designate), to be gained by any players with the cunning and skill to find them all.
